title: Bus ETA API URL
desc: URL to retrieve the next bus ETA

title: ETA Key
desc: The API URL should return a JSON object.  Specify the response JSON key for the ETA value

title: Route
desc: Bus number or route.  Surround with {} if a key exists in the object that provides this information

title: Stop
desc: Bus stop name.  Surround with {} if a key exists in the object that provides this information

title: Direction Bound
desc: Bus direction.  Surround with {} if a key exists in the object that provides this information
